head.supplied: 3/5/89 ¶ ¶ Today on tidying up in the packing room, dear Mr Tepper, a small parcel of photographs was found that must have arrived months ago, but in the very busy time then was laid aside and until ...

div.p: RB MSS M198, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.seg: Heute beim Aufräumen im Pack-Zimmer, lieber Herr Tepper, fand sich ein Päckchen Photogrammen, welches vor Monaten schon angekommen sein muss, aber in sehr geschäftiger Zeit dann zur Seite gelegt wurde u so bisher unberücksichtigt blieb. Ich sende das für Adelaide bestimmte Exemplar jetzt an Sie, da Sie am Besten beurtheilen können, was nun damit zu thun sei.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Today on tidying up in the packing room, dear Mr Tepper, a small parcel of photographs was found that must have arrived months ago, but in the very busy time then was laid aside and until now remained unnoticed. I am now sending the copy destined for Adelaide to you,
Photographs not found. since you can best judge what now should be done with it.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
